see comment below. --- Review status: all files reviewed at latest revision, 1 unresolved discussion, some commit checks failed. --- *[.travis.yml, line 38 at r2](https://reviewable.io:443/reviews/toktok/website/30#-KaFRmADa5xDTjttfvVH:-KaFRmADa5xDTjttfvVI:bruscxk) ([raw file](https://github.com/toktok/website/blob/11c04cc83fb728f4535d6dd5ef9a68e46354abe6/.travis.yml#L38)):* > ```YAML > && echo "[filtering]" > ~/.linkchecker/linkcheckerrc \ > && echo "ignorewarnings=http-robots-denied" >> ~/.linkchecker/linkcheckerrc > - linkchecker --ignore-url "https://travis-ci.org.*" --ignore-url "irc://.*" toktok-site || true > ``` this conflicts with the changes to makefile and travis.yml on master. This change should be moved to the makefile check target. --- *Comments from [Reviewable](https://reviewable.io:443/reviews/toktok/website/30#-:-KaFRxakq0RXiLmDN5NT:bfc6qrl)*

---

*[Makefile, line 51 at r3](https://reviewable.io:443/reviews/toktok/website/30#-KaHbi7f02zPJAooD6zh:-KaHbi7f02zPJAooD6zi:bd5x8x3) ([raw file](https://github.com/toktok/website/blob/9b229790be0fb91c33513935a2ac985eaea9c146/Makefile#L51)):*
> ```Makefile
> 
> check:
> 	mkdir -p ~/.linkchecker/
> ```

Directory might already exist, add a "-" before "mkdir" to allow a failure. Also, if the user's home directory was missing, there's very little chance they'd actually have permission to create it; you can remove the "-p" option.
